attributes.action: Olympics keep Greece as the official home.
attributes.additional_details:
If the Olympics were permanently held in greece, it would boost their income. Each country would pay a set amount which wouldpay for the  upkeep of the permanent buildings and facilities. As maintenance would be continuous it would provide jobs. It wouldalso save counties building specific areas,which cost money and migjht not be used again. Each country would still have to bid, to host the olympics as it were.
 Build the Olympics in one country,in its birthplace.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the IOC.
